channel.title: Correct Item Look/Etc
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2znvpjl.jpg[/img]
I was wondering how exactly I make it so it looks like the correct item?

item.title: Correct Item Look/Etc
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

DemisePking:

you dont have a model thats been added.

lol, dumb ass. He obviously does cuz it’s right there. it’s just the incorrect ints that make up how it is displayed in his inventory or in this case, what he is wearing. Or otherwise, it’s the wrong model that has been added.

Read full topic

item.title: Correct Item Look/Etc
item.dc:creator: @ForeverisForever ForeverisForever
item.description:
@ForeverisForever wrote:

[quote=“ILOVEJAVA, post:2, topic:334094”]umm…for a 508, look in your applet_sub1.java file, and if you don’t have 1, it should be class8.java and/or class7.java. search the file for the item name. here is an example to help you:

if(i_3_ == ItemID here)//this replaces what ever item you used...idk..blah blah
{
class19.anInt330 = vesta's platelegs model id;//inventory/drop model
class19.anInt336 = 1128;//this is the model zoom, higher the number, further out it zooms.
class19.anInt389 = 350;//model rotation, higher number brings top of item towards you.
class19.anInt395 = 0;// model rotation 2
class19.anInt358 = 0;// model offset 1
class19.anInt391 = 30;// model offset 2
class19.anInt390 = IDhere;//Male model id
class19.anInt390 = IDhere;//Female model id
class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves
class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, "Item Name here");//Item Name
}

i would use the ints i have there, it seemed to work for my dplate, so should work for your vesta shizz…mabye not cuz it’s platelegs but idk. umm, i didn’t do a good job explaining, so pm me or reply if you need better explaination/more help or what ever. if you want, send me the part in your file that has to do with the platelegs, i will fix it if i can.[/quote]
Thing is, That didn’t really make sense haha.

Read full topic

item.title: Correct Item Look/Etc
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

umm…for a 508, look in your applet_sub1.java file, and if you don’t have 1, it should be class8.java and/or class7.java. search the file for the item name. here is an example to help you:

if(i_3_ == ItemID here)//this replaces what ever item you used...idk..blah blah
{
class19.anInt330 = vesta's platelegs model id;//inventory/drop model
class19.anInt336 = 1128;//this is the model zoom, higher the number, further out it zooms.
class19.anInt389 = 350;//model rotation, higher number brings top of item towards you.
class19.anInt395 = 0;// model rotation 2
class19.anInt358 = 0;// model offset 1
class19.anInt391 = 30;// model offset 2
class19.anInt390 = IDhere;//Male model id
class19.anInt390 = IDhere;//Female model id
class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves
class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, "Item Name here");//Item Name
}

i would use the ints i have there, it seemed to work for my dplate, so should work for your vesta shizz…mabye not cuz it’s platelegs but idk. umm, i didn’t do a good job explaining, so pm me or reply if you need better explaination/more help or what ever. if you want, send me the part in your file that has to do with the platelegs, i will fix it if i can.

Read full topic
